feed.title: WeKan Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.49
entry.content:
This release adds the following updates:

  • WeKan new release version number from wiki to WeKan repo docs. Thanks to xet7.
  • Updated dependencies. Part 1, Part 2. Thanks to dependabot.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Bugfix: Strikethrough inactive Teams and orginizations logic was inverted. Thanks to Hekatomb.
  • Changed back to original icon of Edit Description. Thanks to saschafoerster, C0rn3j and xet7.
  • Fill out Org and Team in adminReports. Thanks to Hekatomb.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.content:

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.51
entry.content:
This release adds the following updates:

  • Updated dependencies. Thanks to dependabot.
  • Moved docs from wiki to wekan repo docs directory, organized to subdirectories. Organizing and updating in progress. Part 1, Part 2, Part 3, Part 4, Part 5, Part 6, Part 7, Part 8, Part 9, Part 10, Part 11. Thanks to xet7.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Fix ModernDark Cards not showing correctly. Thanks to walster001.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.52
entry.content:
This release adds the following new features:

  • Helm Chart: Add option to set resource limits for initContainer. Thanks to mreichelt-dicos.
  • Helm Chart: Fixes for mongodb persistence. Please test is this correct. Thanks to emoritzx.
  • Helm Chart: Added info about rarely used running WeKan at subpath. Thanks to emoritzx.

and adds the following updates:

  • Updated dependencies. Part 1, Part 2, Part 3, Part 4, Part 5, Part 6, Part 7. Thanks to dependabot.
  • Added RepoCloud SaaS. Part 1, Part 2, Part 3. Thanks to RepoCloud.
  • Updated WeKan app webmanifest. Thanks to xet7.
  • Revert forking of ldapjs. Thanks to xet7.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Fixes to Clean light and Clean dark themes. Thanks to abramchikd.
  • Activities, adding back "created at" field. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Fix typos at attachments code. Thanks to xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.53
entry.content:
This release adds the following new features:

  • Added Dragscroll to scroll the board. Click on an empty space in the board, hold the left mouse and move left and right to scroll the board easily. Thanks to mfilser.

and adds the following updates:

  • Updated release script: New install webpage location. Thanks to xet7.
  • Updated dependencies. Thanks to developers of dependencies.
  • Copied changes from wiki to docs. Thanks to xet7.
  • Updated Snap Candidate to MongoDB 6.0.16. Thanks to MongoDB developers.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Board Menu Popup's were opened twice because of 2 same event creation. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Fixing of "mode is undefined" on first activity component creation. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Changing card color now closes the popup and doesn't refresh the whole board page. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Fix dragscroll package name. Thanks to xet7.
  • Reducing card size in database if no planning poker was started. Thanks to mfilser.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.
